<Text: 2017–18 EFL Cup:  The competition is open to all 92 English and Welsh clubs participating in the Premier League and the English Football League.>

Text: 2017–18 EFL Cup: It is known as the Carabao Cup due to the start of a sponsorship deal with Carabao Energy Drinks after the tournament was unsponsored the previous year.
Triplets:<2017-18 EFL Cup

Text: 2017–18 EFL Cup:  The final will be held at Wembley Stadium in London.

Text: 2017–18 EFL Cup: The reigning champions are Manchester United.

Text: 2017–18 EFL Cup: The winners will qualify for the second qualifying round of the 2018–19 UEFA Europa League.
